we found the food to be rather dull in taste yet the setting had a nice vibe our servers friendliness was appreciated even though her excessively loud talking unintentionally scared us and neighboring guests when she came over however the fresh and delightful dessert made a lasting positive impression
find exceptional bbq at this venue and dont forget to acknowledge the suggestion in the future

loco lime is a top choice for my kids who get to eat at no cost on wednesdays we make it a point to sit in the section managed by nela as she is outstanding and highly attentive give the carnitas tostada accompanied by avocado slices and a boiled egg a shot – it offers great value and convenience
at this reputable resale shop the approachable and knowledgeable workers are happy to help you find whatever you need so be sure to reach out if youre unable to locate it yourself

concerning la banquise theres much to be said about this distinguished establishment in montreal as numerous people view it as having the premier poutine offerings in the city my own love for poutine started here and has led to countless return visits – not to mention that its extended business hours allow for fulfilling those latenight postbar cravings
the property staff and service were truly exceptional – a complete delight leaving me eager to stay there once more
